edit_script:
<actions>
  <update-node tree="member_expression: now < grants[_id].cliff [10203,10226]" label="block.difficulty < grants[_id].cliff" />
  <update-node tree="member_expression: now >= grants[_id].start.add(grants[_id].duration) || grants[_id].revoked [10300,10373]" label="block.difficulty >= grants[_id].start.add(grants[_id].duration) || grants[_id].revoked" />
</actions>
